title: 300 volunteers create giant bottle cap mosaic in Novi Sad
description:
(30 Sep 2017) Some 300 volunteers used 100 tons of plastic bottle caps to form a giant mosaic on a square in the northern Serbian city of Novi Sad on Saturday.
The humanitarian organisation 'The Bottle Cap for the Handicapped' organised the event in an effort to raise awareness about dangers to ecology and to raise aid for disabled children. 
The bottle caps that are collected are sent to a recycling plant and the funds are used to purchase whatever equipment disabled children need.
The planned, 600-square-metre (yards) picture will be nominated for a Guinness world record.


You can license this story through AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/metadata/youtube/72da5b159d4a7b8b3cfef954d1451283 
Find out more about AP Archive: http://www.aparchive.com/HowWeWork
